content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position 43.0, -82.0) and a furnace at position (41.0, -82.0)
-  Burner inserter (position 43.5, -80.5) that picks up items from the mining drill and drops them into a chest at position (43.5, -79.5)
-  Chests at positions (42.5, -83.5), (44.5, -81.5), and (45.5, -80.5) that store the mined coal
-  Chest at position (43.5, -79.5) that is used as a buffer to store excess coal

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
-  Make sure the agent has enough space in its inventory to hold the extracted items
### Errors when mining with a burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has enough fuel to continue mining
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full, empty it before continuing mining
### Errors when using a burner inserter
-  Ensure the inserter has enough space in the destination chest to drop items
-  Make sure the source chest has items to pick up before attempting to insert items into the destination chest
